item.title: April 2008
item.description: What are you doing between April 20 and April 23rd ??? You don’t know ?? Well if you are the least bit interested in computers, there is only one place to be… The Minasi Forum meet 2008

item.title: Aften hygge...
item.description: I aftes var vi ude at spise p√• et sted, som hed Pungo Ranch bar. Jeg var glad for at jeg havde GPS i bilen, for det lignede mere eller mindre en forladt hytte.
